Analyzed.name: Analyzed
Analyzed.description: This card cannot be chosen for any further <c=action>analysis</c>.

Reevaluated.name: Re-evaluated
Reevaluated.description: This card cannot be chosen for <c=card>Re-evaluation</c>, but can be chosen for <c=action>analysis</c>.

SmartShield.name: Smart Shield
SmartShield.description: Gain up to {{Amount}} <c=status>shield</c>, converting any remaining to <c=status>temp shield</c>.

Analyze.name: Analyze
Analyze.description: Choose a non-<c=cardtrait>analyzed</c>, non-<c=cardtrait>temp</c> card in hand. It gains <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c> until end of combat.

Analyzable.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = All other analyzable cards in hand (<c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c>).
Analyzable.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = All other analyzable cards in hand.
